alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:59AM MST until October 16 at 2:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 158 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Tempe, Sun Lakes, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Chandler City Hall and Firebird Lake. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 161 and 170. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 158 and 170. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 47 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
